issue.title: [Packaging][deb] Drop support for Debian GNU/Linux buster
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16764](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16764). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It will reach EOL at 2022-08.

See also: https://wiki.debian.org/DebianReleases
